text: Hey Mark, shall we quickly plan the Q2 marketing campaign timeline?
Sure! I think we should start with the social media rollout in early April.
Agreed. We need to align on the budget first—do we have $15k or $20k approved?
$18k is the current figure. Let’s aim for $15k to leave some buffer.
Good call. Then content creation in mid-April, ads launch by May 1st?
Yes. I’ll handle the ad copy, you take care of the visuals and landing page.
Perfect. Should we include influencer outreach this time?
Definitely—let’s target micro-influencers in the tech niche.
Okay, I’ll make a shortlist of 10–15 by next week.
Great. Any thoughts on video content vs static posts?
Video performs better lately, but let’s do a mix—60% video, 40% static.
Sounds solid. We can A/B test both formats in the first two weeks.
Yes, and track engagement weekly to adjust.
Do we need to coordinate with the product team for any new features?
Not this quarter—focus is purely marketing push.
Understood. So timeline is: planning now, content April, launch May.
Exactly. Let’s lock that in.
By the way, have you seen the new iPhone 17 rumors? Crazy camera specs.
Wait—what? We were just finalizing the campaign timeline…
Sorry, got distracted. I just saw it on my feed.
Okay, let’s stay on track. Campaign timeline—any last adjustments?
Right, sorry again. Timeline looks good as is.
No problem. Moving on—do we need a kickoff meeting with the whole team?
Yes, let’s schedule one for next Monday.
I’ll send the invite today.
Perfect. Should we prepare a short deck?
Yes, just 5–6 slides: goals, timeline, budget, KPIs.
I can draft the goals and KPIs section.
Great, I’ll do timeline and budget.
Let’s aim to finish the deck by Friday.
Agreed. Anything else we need before launch?
Only the final creative assets from design—due April 20th.
I’ll ping them today to confirm.
Cool. I think that covers it.
One more thing—tracking tools? Google Analytics + social platform insights?
Yes, plus UTM parameters on all links.
Done. We’re set.
Speaking of links… have you tried the new ramen place downtown? Insane broth.
Mark… we’re literally finalizing the campaign. What’s with the food talk?
Haha, my bad—again. Just hungry. Back to business.
Okay, focus. Campaign is locked. Anything else?
Nope. We’re good. Thanks for keeping us on track.
No worries. Let’s make this Q2 killer.
Absolutely. Talk soon!
Yes—have a good rest of the day.
You too!
See you Monday for the kickoff.
Looking forward to it.
Great. Bye!
Bye!
